message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit too high for my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we discuss a price of $135? I think it's a fair compromise.
I'm still a bit short on budget, can you meet me at $125?
I'm not sure I can go any lower, Bob. But I'm willing to make one last offer. How about we meet at $130? It's the lowest I'm willing to go.
I'm really close to buying from John at $120, so I'm willing to make one last offer. Can you meet me at $125?
